Articles.Content: Simple question. Can the Ore on MÃƒÂ¼n be dedepleted like kethane or is it infinite like karbonite.

On asteroids its limited, but in planets and moons i don't know, but i would guess they are infinite.

It seems like they set up a resource system to be expanded in the future with more resources added so that might change, but i think its unlikely.
